name: Central Park
description: A large public park with walking trails, gardens, and recreational facilities.

name: City Museum
description: A museum showcasing the rich history and culture of the city.

name: Riverfront
description: A scenic spot along the river with dining and outdoor activities.

name: Grand Mall
description: A shopping center with retail stores, restaurants, and entertainment options.

name: Skyview Tower
description: A skyscraper offering panoramic views of the city from its observation deck.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: A beautiful garden filled with rare plants, flowers, and walking paths.

name: Sports Complex
description: A state-of-the-art facility for various sports, including soccer, tennis, and swimming.

name: Historic District
description: A preserved area with colonial-era buildings and museums.
